## Itinerary

### Analysis

 - The basics (using base R, `ggplot2`)
 - Effective R (using `dplyr`, `data.table`)

### Reporting

 - Analytical documents (using `knitr` and `rmarkdown`)
 - Interactive reports (using `shiny`)
 - Development best practices (using Git, `devtools` & `testthat`)

### Infrastructure

 - Linux in a Windows environment (Linux VMs with Rstudio server)
 - Reporting (using Shiny server)
